typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{ Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{ vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as double,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		fact_filter as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		cout_standard_cd_ as string,
		cout_fabrication as string,
		cout_standard_livr_ as string,
		cout_standard_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
renam derive({Code client} = replace( {Code client}, " ", ""),
		yearmonth = replace(yearmonth, " ", ""),
		Article = replace(reference, " ", "")) ~> Cleansing
Cleansing aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté facturée} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> SumQuantity
SumQuantity select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qté vente directe} = {Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumn
RenameColumn select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		reference = Article,
		{Code client},
		qte_ecoulement = {Qté vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Uniformisation
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		{Code client} = {Récept. de march.},
		{Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renam
Uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['VENTES_DIRECTES_PREPARATION.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
